long_description: This Thule Criterium Upright Bike Mount push the bike carrier envelope with their upright rack--please, no staring! Features rack-level, dial-activated clamp, push button-clamp release and sleek, sculpted wheel tray. Easy loading; sculpted wheel tray and support arm clamp work together and help keep bike in position when securing your bike to the carrier. Simple-to-use rack-level adjustment dial closes clamp around bike tube for ultimate transport stability. Unloading the bike is a breeze with fast, push-button clamp release. Low-profile wheel tray and dual-action wheel strap fits all tire sizes without the need for a wheel adaptor. Accommodates bike frames up to 3-3/8'' diameter. Fits square and round load bars, sold separately. Made from durable anodized aluminum, steel and rubber. Please note: this bike carrier requires the use of Xadapter XADAPT8 when used on Aeroblade & Rapid Aero Bars, sold separately.
short_description: This Thule Criterium Upright Bike Mount push the bike carrier envelope with their upright rack--please, no staring!
